General.Name: Shenzhen Friendcom Technology Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Friendcom Technology Development Co., Ltd. provides wireless M2M solutions worldwide. The company offers low voltage power collection terminal products, including micro power wireless, power line carrier, and CFDA auxiliary equipment; intelligent power distribution products; water and gas heat meter low power modules; wireless digital radios; RF modules; water meters; gas meters; energy meters; automatic meter reading equipment; electric meters; wireless M-Bus modules; cellular network modules; LoRa products, which includes WAN modules and terminals; and sewage treatment. The company's products are used in smart grid, utility metering, wireless connectivity, and test equipment; and in the areas of smart home, intelligent security, intelligent transportation, precision agriculture, utilities meter data collection, etc. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

4.Name: Mr. Zheng Zhao  Shen
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
